name: Shades of Deception
description:
When a shady gambler is found dead, a sinister conspiracy begins to unravel.

Discover clues, interrogate suspects and find out who is behind this mysterious killing.

Controls:

  • E to Interact with & Inspect objects
  • LMB to rotate objects
  • Tab to toggle Notebook

Programmers:

  • Zuhair Ghias
  • Eelis Koivusaari
  • Mahad Gul
  • John Marman
  • Alexander Mastryukov

Artists:

  • Axel Kuomaa (Lead Artist)
  • Angelo Hizon (Characters)
  • Michael Milani (Props & Environment)
  • Ceyhun Yanikdag (Concept Art)
  • Tina Zhang (Cover Art)

Soundtrack & Audio:

  • Andy Gardner

Writing:

  • Alexander Mastryukov
  • Makhan Milani

Voices:

  • Makhan Milani (Justin Thyme)
  • Cloris He (Anita Minute)
  • Alexander Mastryukov (Others)
